Articles.Content:
I recently got into the stealth game and one of the first things I wanted to build is a stealth flying wing.  It seem to work at first but then I made the grave mistake of trying to land the thing... I lost control and splatted into a million pieces.

I think the problem is the yaw axis controls I used some airbrakes on both wings but it doesn't seem to be enough at low speeds. Do you have any recommendations ?
I use BDA+ and procedural wings by the way
